This version includes the change that allow multiple query paramaters with the same name (https://github.com/millermedeiros/crossroads.js/pull/128) part of the v.0.13.0 milestone (https://github.com/millermedeiros/crossroads.js/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3Av0.13.0)

allow multiple query parameters with same name

Allows multiple query parameters to have the same name. The values are parsed into an array. As proposed in issue #90.
Changes interpolate in pattern_lexer.js and decodeQueryString in intro.js as discussed.

Merge branch 'dev'

* dev:
  accept number as segment on Route.interpolate(). closes #gh-54
  update jasmine runner
  Normalizes IE 7-8 RegExp behavior fixing many bugs.
accept number as segment on Route.interpolate(). closes #gh-54
update jasmine runner

Normalizes IE 7-8 RegExp behavior fixing many bugs.

Optional capturing groups are matched as an empty string on IE 7-8
while it is matched as `undefined` on other browsers. The global
flag also causes some undesired side effects on IE 7-8 so make
sure we reset the `RegExp.lastIndex` during `captureVals`.

 - closes #gh-58

type. It will also remain compatible with legacy version.
